content: I enjoyed this article. I am one of the allegedly rare person who actually liked the Star Wars I, II and III series, particularly the second and third films. The entire sequence asked the question, what happens when a slave child is plucked, literally from obscurity and isolation, because of his exceptional gifts and turned into a tool of the warring power elites. What I found interesting is that both the Sith and the Jedi were equally arrogant and committed to exploiting Anakin, for their respective purposes.
